alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 13 at 4:06AM PDT until March 14 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. The winds will be strongest through the I-5 Corridor. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will make driving difficult. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways impacted by the strong winds include Highways 101 and 154, especially across Gaviota and San Marcos Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
